Square Products
Square Products

Find out more about Square’s flagship products, including the Square Reader, Square Register, Square Stand, Square Cash, and Square Market.

Square Reader

The Square Reader plugs directly into your mobile device and allows you to quickly and safely accept credit cards. The reader fits right in your pocket and securely encrypts every swipe.

Once you activate your Square account we'll automatically ship your free card reader. You can also pick up a reader from a participating retail store. 

SQUA(RED) Reader

hello world

Square businesses are working with (RED)™ to move one step closer to an AIDS FREE GENERATION. For every (PRODUCT)RED™ Special Edition Reader ordered, 97.25% of the donation amount will go to the Global Fund to fight AIDS. And every time a business accepts credit cards with the SQUA(RED) Reader, customers will receive an emailed receipt from which they can donate directly. Every swipe can make a difference. 

Learn more about SQUA(RED). Get your SQUA(RED) Reader with a $10 donation via Square Market. 

Square Register

Square Register lets you accept credit cards and orders for pickup quickly and easily on your smartphone or iPad. On the iPad, the Register app includes additional features to create an even more elegant, seamless experience at your counter. Sign up for Square Register. 

Square Stand

The Square Stand allows you to grow your business in a few simple steps. Easily configure your point of sale by connecting a compatible cash drawer, receipt printer, and barcode scanner.

Square Market is an online shop that connects Square merchants and their customers. Shoppers can place orders for in-person pickup or for delivery by mail. Merchants can highlight their businesses with photos, items, and links to social media. 

Square Capital

Square Capital provides easy access to funds for growing a business. Whether you need money to buy equipment, hire employees, or open a new location, funds can be deposited in your bank account as soon as the next business day.

Square Cash

Square Cash allows you to send, request, and receive money for free, using your email address and debit card.

Send Square Cash over email from a computer. Or, download the free app from the App Store or Google Play.
